puwathpath athulu janamadhya magin hejin prashnaya gana kothekuth katha kalath, me wipathata rata ada dama janathawa hejin ugule patalu wagakiwayuththanta erehiwa rajaya kisidu piyawarak noganima gana yuda jayagrahanayata aashirwada kala saha me rajayata almak dakwana sama kenekugema imahath sanwegayata hethu wi atha.
